title: Episode #4: Man Stories with Dan Kern
description: Welcome back to another edition of the Art of Manliness podcast. In this episode we return to our series called "Man Stories" where we interview a different man every other week and ask him what it mean for him to be a man. Our guest this week is Dan Kern. Dan hails from Winnipeg, Canada and he works as a voice actor for a living.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
